DocumentationDefinitionList.Title: User preferences: Attributes of a preference node
DocumentationDefinitionList.Heading: Attributes of a preference node

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Name of the preference. The name is used interally as identifier for the preference.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: A nice name for the preference. It is displayed in the preference dialog. If not given, the name attribute is displayed

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Additional information on the preference. It is displayed when hovering over the preference's (nice) name in the preference dialog.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The widget used for the preference in the preference dialog. If not configured, the String widget is used. (There are some settings where special widgets are used, e.g., language, project, site and folder selection. These widgets are chosen dependent on the preference name.)

Description.name: Description0

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: A regular expression, that the value of the preference must match. If another value is chosen, the specified error message is shown.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The message displayed if the value chosen for the preference is invalid.
